mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectMbrCookieEncrtKey Generator(Generator) 2018-04-13 */ ENCRT_PSNL_KEY FROM MBR_COOKIE_ENCRT_KEY WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.updateMbrCookieEncrtKey Generator(Generator) 2018-04-13 */ MBR_COOKIE_ENCRT_KEY SET ENCRT_PSNL_KEY = #{encrtPsnlKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE 1 = 1
